name: Ryusei
text:
[Player]-saaan!!
Over here!

name: Ryusei
text:
Sorry about that—!
I arrived earlier than I thought,
so I was just doing some sprints.

name: Ryusei
text: ...Ah, today too, my thigh muscles are responding to me properly...!

name: Ryusei
text: I'll have to have a good conversation with all my muscles later too!

options.text: It's been a while since a live muscle check!
You haven't changed at all...

text:
A few days after the Choco Volcano incident.
All filming for ChocoFull had finished, and the released program was a huge hit—

[Player], who had returned to their daily life,
was invited by Ryusei, and was spending their day off together.

name: Ryusei
text:
Sorry for inviting you so suddenly.
I really wanted to contact you earlier
and plan properly, but—

name: Ryusei
text:
The response to ChocoFull was amazing,
and temporary jobs suddenly increased.
So, my days off are often decided at the last minute...

options.text: ChocoFull got an amazing response, didn't it?
It's the result of everyone's hard work!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ahaha, thank you!
Hearing you say that, makes me feel
like all the hard work was worth it!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Oops, chatting and training here is nice, but
there's somewhere I want to go today!

name: Ryusei
text:
Let's go, [Player]-san!
I'm sure [Player]-san will love it too!
Saying that with a beaming smile, Ryusei gently took [Player]'s hand and began to walk.

And where they walked, guided along,
was a certain sauna facility in Orient City.

name: Ryusei
text:
Mmm, it's so warm—!
My muscles are loosening up nicely,
and it feels incredibly good—!
Sweat dripped from Ryusei's body, flushed with steam and heat, as he beamed a full smile.

options.text: This heat...
It reminds me of Choco Volcano.
Is this why you came to the sauna, perhaps?

name: Ryusei
text:
Ahaha, did you guess?
It became an unforgettable job, so
I come here sometimes when I want to remember it!

name: Ryusei
text:
It's true there were dangerous moments, but
it was a really fun shoot—!
I also got to be good friends with everyone who was with me!

options.text: Yeah, I had fun too!
...By the way, Ryusei-san.
Are your injuries okay now?

name: Ryusei
text:
Injuries...?
Oh, from back then!

name: Ryusei
text:
Thank you for worrying!
I'm perfectly fine now—!
See, there's no scar left, right?
As he spoke, a muscular arm, with all traces of injury gone, was proudly extended in front of [Player].

name: Ryusei
text:
See?
So, you don't have to make that face anymore!
—And also, I'm happy.

name: Ryusei
text: ...That I was able to feel like I wanted to protect [Player]-san.

In the small space filled with heat and steam,
Ryusei gently lowered his gaze.

name: Ryusei
text:
[Player]-san.
Just being an "Observer",
wasn't it strange how people focused on you, and difficult?

name: Ryusei
text:
...Ah, sorry!
I asked something difficult to answer, didn't I.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I used to be weak, both in mind and body.
I hated my own body,
and I barely had any friends.

name: Ryusei
text:
Even though I wanted to change,
I lacked the trigger and courage to take a step forward,
and I... hated that about myself.

name: Ryusei
text:
I would always become cynical about everything,
and just kept repeating the phrase "what's the point?"
In the silent space, the faint sound of their sweat dripping echoed.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I talked about it a bit during the shoot, but
that's when I encountered a monster disaster.

name: Ryusei
text:
When I encountered it,
I thought it was natural that I'd be left behind.
I thought, 'it can't be helped'.

name: Ryusei
text:
Back then, I felt like I had nothing.
Maybe that's why, at first, I thought, 'it's fine if I just disappear'.

name: Ryusei
text:
...But when the monster appeared right in front of me,
and I thought I might really disappear,
I was so scared I couldn't move an inch.

name: Ryusei
text:
I closed my eyes, crouched down...
And when I noticed, I was being held and rescued
by an incredibly strong hero.

name: Ryusei
text:
After that, he covered me with his back,
getting all battered, but still facing the monster and fighting it head-on.

name: Ryusei
text:
After it was all over, that person tried to leave,
and even though I had so much I wanted to say,
I couldn't say anything—

name: Ryusei
text:
Yet, before I knew it, I was asking:
"How can I become strong and robust, like you?"

With those words, Ryusei looked up.
Perhaps remembering that time, his face was tinged with a slight embarrassment.

name: Ryusei
text:
Then, he smiled and hugged me,
and while stroking my head, he said this to me.

name: Ryusei
text:
"Building up, one step at a time, without giving up.
Training doesn't betray you.
You yourself will become your own greatest hero."

name: Ryusei
text:
...Those words still remain with me.
They are the words that made me feel like I was reborn.

options.text: I think those are very wonderful words.
So that's the origin of your dream, Ryusei-san.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, that's what I thought then!
If I have nothing, I don't need to fear losing it,
I just need to build up little by little from now on.

name: Ryusei
text:
Before thinking, "it can't be helped if I disappear,"
I decided to try what I could do last, to build up at least one small thing.

name: Ryusei
text:
Even if that failed, I wouldn't give up on my dream,
and start training from where I could!

name: Ryusei
text:
At first, the results were really small.
Those accumulated, and I became a hero.
I joined Galaxy Athletes and...

options.text: Eh!?
Ryusei-san's affiliation is...
Were you with a different agency at first?

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh, didn't I mention that?
At first, I was active as a hero as a physique athlete!

name: Ryusei
text:
When I achieved my goal of winning a competition, I transferred agencies.
This time, to convey the joy of physique and fitness—

name: Ryusei
text:
That people can change through small accumulations, and that it's okay to like yourself.
I wanted to tell that to many people!

name: Ryusei
text:
I love who I am now, you know!
It's still not exactly ideal, but
I still think there are many good things about it!

options.text: Being able to like yourself is wonderful.
Isn't that also a form of love?

name: Ryusei
text:
Thank you!
It makes me so happy to hear [Player]-san say that—!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Honestly, I'm still scared.
That someday I might say "what's the point?" again.

name: Ryusei
text:
But, at that time, my body moved on its own.
My muscles responded, trying to help [Player]-san.

name: Ryusei
text:
And what was said to me after that...
That the me now and the me before the change
are both still me—

name: Ryusei
text:
That if any part of me were missing,
the me now wouldn't exist.
Everyone's words made me incredibly happy.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I'm going to love myself even more.
And then, this time, I need to return that love to everyone!

options.text: That's very much like you, Ryusei-san.
I'm cheering for you!
I'm looking forward to your return of love.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, leave it to me—!
Of course, I'll deliver my love to [Player]-san too!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Oops, sorry for talking so much.
Shall we get out soon? We shouldn't forget to hydrate!
[Player] nodded at Ryusei's words, and as they tried to stand, they swayed slightly.

name: Ryusei
text:
—Whoa!
[Player]-san, are you okay?

name: Ryusei
text:
Sorry, did I overdo it...?
I'll support you, so lean on me.
Let's go drink some water right away.
Ryusei embraced [Player] in his arms and gently supported them.

options.text: S-sorry...
If I cool down a bit... I'll be fine!

name: Ryusei
text:
Mmm, that felt good—!
Thanks to [Player]-san,
today was super fun!

options.text: Same here, I felt so relaxed.
It was super fun!
I think I'm getting hooked...

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha!
If you say that,
I'm glad I invited you—!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, that's right!
I wanted to give this to [Player]-san!

name: Ryusei
text:
The first step of returning my love!
After the shoot, I prepared this myself because I wanted to give it to [Player]-san.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I want [Player]-san to see all sorts of 'me' from now on.
Not just the usual me—

name: Ryusei
text:
Even the me who might say "what's the point?" like the old me.
I want you to see everything that I am.
Saying that, Ryusei gently took [Player]'s hand and smiled.

name: Ryusei
text:
And, I want to know more about [Player]-san too!
So—

name: Ryusei
text: I'd be really happy if you would spend your private time with me again, like this?

The night breeze swept through Orient City.
It gently caressed the two of them, leaving behind a hint of spring's warmth.
